title: FS: T3 John McGraw - nice SGC 40
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: T3 John McGraw - nice SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Hi - selling this gorgeous T3 John McGraw SGC 40. Light wrinkle top center edge (when oriented as shown below), is really the only issue holding this back from a higher grade.  Otherwise, very nice and clean T3!

$975 delivered.  I can get you better scans later tonight if interested.

Thanks for looking!
Scott
